Storyline

In the future, a spaceship called Serenity is harboring a 
passenger with a deadly secret. Six rebels on the run. 
An assassin in pursuit. When the renegade crew of Serenity 
agrees to hide a fugitive on their ship, they find themselves 
in an awesome action-packed battle between the relentless 
military might of a totalitarian regime who will destroy 
anything - or anyone - to get the girl back and the bloodthirsty 
creatures who roam the uncharted areas of space. But, the 
greatest danger of all may be on their ship.
